name: The Dream Warrior
description:
A text-based story adventure, you play a college student with the power to enter others' dreams. First, pick your target. Then, dive into their dream world. How you play could have repercussions in the waking world, so make your choices wisely. Become their guide or become their nightmare.

This is an early-access demo that tells the story of Damien, an eight-year-old foster-care runaway. After completing the game, I'd love to hear your thoughts.

Recommended age: 13+

Contains: mild language, some sexual themes, and drug use
